title: ADa hOgONa
sahitya:
ADa hOgONa bArO ranga Odi hOgalu bEDO krSNa


caraNam 1    aNNe kallu gOli gajiga ciNNikOlu ceNDubuguri 
kaNNu muccAle halavu kUDa baNNadADagaLanella
    caraNam 2    sOlu geluvigella nInu bAlakaroLu kUDi koNDu 
mEle mamateyinde sAnukUlavAgi naDasuvante
    caraNam 3    puTTa puTTa koLalu kambaLi kaTTi butti kaiyali kOLu 
diTTa celuvanAda purandara viTTala gOvaLara rAya
